code: import React,{useCallback,useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const colorSelector={"Purple":"#8434E1","Black":"#252525","White":"#FFFFFF","Gray":"#808080","Blue":"#0000FF","Red":"#FF0000","Orange":"#FFA500","Navy":"#000080","Grey":"#808080","Yellow":"#FFFF00","Pink":"#FFC0CB","Green":"#008000"};const ColorsFilter=_ref=>{let{colors}=_ref;const[appliedColors,setAppliedColors]=useState([]);const onClickDiv=useCallback(item=>{if(appliedColors.indexOf(item)>-1){setAppliedColors(appliedColors===null||appliedColors===void 0?void 0:appliedColors.filter(color=>color!==item));}else{setAppliedColors([...appliedColors,item]);}},[appliedColors,setAppliedColors]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-[16px] text-black mt-5 mb-5",children:"Colors"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex flex-wrap px-2",children:colors===null||colors===void 0?void 0:colors.map(item=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col mr-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-8 h-8 border rounded-xl mr-4 cursor-pointer hover:scale-110",onClick:()=>onClickDiv(item),style:{background:`${colorSelector[item]}`}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-sm text-gray-400 mb-2",style:{color:`${appliedColors!==null&&appliedColors!==void 0&&appliedColors.includes(item)?'black':''}`},children:item})]});})})]});};export default ColorsFilter;
